questions.question: Why do we align the grain of Balsa wood along the span of the wing?
options: Because wood is strongest along the grain
Because it is easier to cut

options: It will likely snap easily between the layers (Layer Delamination)

questions.question: The strongest orientation to print a 3D part is:
options: Lying flat (so layers run along the length of the stress)

questions.question: "Stress Concentration" happens at:

options: Add a radius/curve to the corner

questions.question: "Torsion" refers to:

options: The spars from sliding past each other (Buckling)

options: To increase surface area and mechanical grip for the glue

options: It is lighter than steel and doesn't rust

questions.question: "Anodizing" is a process to:
options: Coat aluminum with a protective/colored oxide layer

questions.question: "Fatigue" in metal means:
options: Weakening caused by repeated stress cycles (vibration)

questions.question: The "Neutral Axis" of a beam (spar) is where:
options: There is zero stress (neither tension nor compression)

questions.question: Bernoulli's Principle states that as the speed of a fluid (air) increases, its pressure:
"Induced Drag" is primarily caused by:
options: Friction of air on the skin

questions.question: Ideally, for a stable rocket, the Center of Pressure (CP) must be:
options: Ahead of the Center of Gravity (CG)

questions.question: "Adverse Yaw" means:
options: When banking left, the nose tries to turn right
When banking left, the nose turns left perfectly

questions.question: A "Washout" in wing design (twisting wingtips down) is used to:
options: Prevent tip stalls by ensuring the root stalls first

The "Area Rule" (Coke bottle shape fuselage) is used to reduce:
"Fin Flutter" is caused by:

options: Reducing throttle and applying opposite rudder

questions.question: Which flight mode uses the Accelerometer to limit the bank angle and self-level the drone?

options: Step down high battery voltage to 5V for powering electronics

questions.question: The "UART" ports on a Flight Controller are used for:
options: Connecting serial peripherals like GPS, Receiver, or VTX

questions.question: If your drone flips over instantly upon takeoff, the most common cause is:
options: A motor spinning the wrong way OR a propeller on the wrong motor

questions.question: Why do we never power on a VTX (Video Transmitter) without the antenna?
options: It will overheat and burn out the amplifier
It will drain the battery instantly

questions.question: If your drone oscillates (shakes) quickly during flight, your PID "P-Gain" is likely:
Why do high-power drones use a Capacitor on the battery pads?
options: To filter out voltage spikes (noise) that can damage electronics

questions.question: "Crossfire" and "ELRS" are protocols used for:
options: Long Range Radio Control links (900MHz / 2.4GHz LoRa)

questions.question: "Soft Mounting" the Flight Controller helps to:
options: Reduce vibration noise reaching the Gyro

questions.question: If your OSD shows "Land Now", it is usually triggered by:
The "Kv" rating on a motor refers to:
A higher pitch propeller (e.g., 5050 vs 5040) generally:
options: Increases top speed but draws more amps and has less low-end torque

questions.question: The "C-Rating" on a battery indicates:
options: The maximum safe continuous discharge rate

questions.question: "Voltage Sag" is when:
options: Battery voltage drops temporarily under heavy load

questions.question: If you switch from a 3S to a 4S battery on the SAME motor/prop setup:
options: The motor spins faster, draws significantly MORE current, and might burn

questions.question: If you put a BIG propeller on a High KV motor:
options: The motor will likely overheat and burn out (Over-propped)
It is the most efficient setup

questions.question: "Choked Flow" in a rocket nozzle means:
options: The gas velocity has reached Mach 1 at the throat

questions.question: A "CATO" (Catastrophe at Take Off) where the motor explodes is often caused by:
options: The nozzle throat being too small (Pressure over-pressurization)

questions.question: Why do we "Balance" LiPo batteries?
options: To ensure every cell is at the exact same voltage
To make sure the weight is centered

questions.question: "Desync" in a drone motor occurs when:
options: The ESC loses track of the motor's magnetic position during rapid acceleration

options: The internal density/pattern of the part

options: Lying flat (so stress runs along the filament lines, not across layers)

options: The outer skin carrying the structural load
